trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_SEQ_00<tab>Hien has what can be best described as a “shite-eating grin.”
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Temulun.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the diligent Mol warrior.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TODO_02<tab>Strike a /victorypose at the mark of Mol Iloh.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Cirina.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_LYSE_000_000<tab>Go on! They're waiting for you, I'm sure!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>The others have returned as well, it would seem.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_010<tab>We won...we actually won! I mean, you did. If it were not for you...
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_DORBEI_000_020<tab>I...I took a wound. But it will heal with time and care. The children are gathering herbs for a poultice.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_DORBEI_000_025<tab>Had the Naadam lasted much longer, I may not have survived. Thank you.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_040<tab>I saw you fight, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You were incredible!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLB02514_000_045<tab>My arms, my legs, everything is tired and sore. I feel as though I could sleep for a day...
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLC02514_000_050<tab>Where did you learn such feats? Is everyone in the West as strong as you? Can you teach me!?
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLD02514_000_055<tab>Stop fidgeting and let me set the bone! You're only making it worse for yourself!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLE02514_000_060<tab><pant> <pant> I know, I know! Just...just give me a moment!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_HIEN_000_070<tab>Ah, but it would be rude of me to monopolize your attention. Doubtless there are others who would speak with you.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_HIEN_000_071<tab>Let us go and greet Temulun Khatun.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_LYSE_000_080<tab>I hope everyone is all right...or alive, at least.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_HIEN_000_085<tab>Temulun Khatun! We are returned, and victorious!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_GOSETSU_000_090<tab>Ah...mayhap you should speak with the khatun instead of me. That is why we are here, is it not?
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TEMULUN_000_100<tab>Welcome, warriors of the Steppe. It is an honor to receive you once more.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TEMULUN_000_101<tab>We observed the battle from a distance, and marked the moment of your triumph. In that instant, I wept tears of joy.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TEMULUN_000_102<tab>Not only did you bring us victory in the Naadam, but you ensured that every one of my kinsmen returned with their lives.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_103<tab>Some were more gravely wounded than others, but none were lost to us. We could not have asked for anything more.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_104<tab>If it is not too much of an imposition, would you be willing to go and speak with them? A simple gesture for those with whom you shared the battlefield.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_LYSE_000_110<tab>You really shouldn't... I mean, I'm glad you're all right, but we had our own reasons for fighting, and it feels wrong to be thanked for that...
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_HIEN_000_115<tab>Hahaha! The pleasure and the pain that can only come in the wake of a battle. I know it well.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_GOSETSU_000_120<tab>How long it has been since last I saw young men and women celebrating a hard-fought victory... Let us pray we enjoy a similar sign in Yanxia soon.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_125<tab>Please, it would mean a great deal to the others if you were to go and speak with them again.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_TEMULUN_000_130<tab>For the Mol to triumph in the Naadam with the aid of outsiders. The Steppe will not soon forget this day.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_140<tab>Some part of me still struggles to believe it, but we won! We defeated the Oronir and the Dotharl and won!

TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_141<tab>When they appeared before us I was filled with such fear as I had never known. But then I saw you charge with Cirina and the others, and before I knew it, I was running and shouting...
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_142<tab>I will carry the memory of that moment with me always. As well as the moment when you became one with the ovoo and were declared khagan!

TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_143<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>victorypose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> you struck was a sight to behold! I say, would you be willing to show us again?

TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_150<tab>It is a silly thing to ask, I know, but I must! Please, will you not show us again your grand <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>victorypose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>?
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLC02514_000_160<tab>Aye, that's the stuff of legends! That's the khagan in all <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> splendor!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_161<tab>Praise be to the khagan, and to the gods for guiding <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to us!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLD02514_000_162<tab>Glory to the khagan and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> comrades! Forever and forever! A hundred years! The khagan!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_LYSE_000_170<tab>I think they love you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! They really, really love you!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_HIEN_000_175<tab>It is good that they can delight in such simple things as the dramatic posings of a comrade.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_GOSETSU_000_180<tab>Like the child and the father, the student and the master, all men need an ideal for which to strive.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLA02514_000_185<tab>How impressive! I shall have to practice with my own weapons until I can do the same!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLB02514_000_190<tab>I could hear the others cheering. What did I miss? Is there to be a feast or some other celebration?
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLC02514_000_195<tab>How I envy you, khagan! You could court the <var 08 E905 ((man)) ((woman)) /var> of your choice!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLD02514_000_200<tab>Have a care that it heals properly. There is much work to be done, and you will be needed.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_MOLE02514_000_205<tab>Yes, yes, I know...even in victory we must look to the future.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_210<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I am told you gave the young warriors a fine show!
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_211<tab>Grandmother and I have been discussing how we might best express our gratitude to you. Mere words did not seem sufficient.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_212<tab>This is a morin khuur─a traditional instrument of our people.
TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_213<tab>The feats of our greatest heroes, like Bardam and Chakha, are preserved in song. Yours too will live on for years to come.

TEXT_STMBDA417_02516_CIRINA_000_214<tab>Perhaps one day you might learn how to play it! But, even if not, you may look on the morin khuur and remember this time, this place. As we will when we hearken to the music.
